title: Blackberry Playbook Apps Part 1 - Manav19
description:
This torrent contains::

1)what's up V 1.5.bar
2)HD Tablet Tv Pro V 1.0.0
3)Pacemaker V 1.1.1.bar (100 % working)(Updated)
4)Smart Office 2 V 2.0.3.bar
5)Note smartly V 1.0.6.bar
6)Talking Hamster V 1.0.1.bar
7)Sonic Air V 2.5.5.bar


Well these apps rock but prices asked for most of them by the developers does'nt

Well i can upload any famous game or app for the PB if i get requests and enough positive responses

INSTRUCTIONS::::::::

1)Install DDPB software (Included in this torrent)
2)connect your playbook
3)turn on development mode
4)go the the homescreen
5)notice a new icon on the icon bar.Tap on it and enter the Ip Address from here into the DDPB installer
6)enter the password
7)click on connect
8)make sure your wifi is on
9)add the file and click on install

NOTE::::I upload these games and apps because these are excellent and help us make full use of our Playbook....but most of them are very costly and also require credit cards....Thats why i may not upload games that are available at cheap rates at the app world(eg:Gameloft games)......If u can Buy then please buy Them cause it hurts the developers financially

Enjoy....n PLS SEED!!!! and dont forget to +1
